A wrapper around a WebGLBuffer with binding to ARRAY_BUFFER.

Protected contextProvider

contextProvider: ContextProvider

Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer.contextProvider

  • Defined in core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:54

We hold onto the context provider after a contextGain event. However, this is only a convenience for derived classes. (Maybe we should not do this). We only need to release this property in our destructor. We must not try to trigger a contextFree as that would violate Implementation Hierarchy Principle.

usageGL: number
  • Defined in core/VertexBuffer.ts:19

  • isZombie(): boolean

  • Inherited from ShareableBase.isZombie

    • Defined in core/ShareableBase.ts:112

    An object is a zombie if it has been released by all who have held references. In some cases it may be possible to recycle a zombie.

    Returns boolean

Protected setLoggingName

  • setLoggingName(name: string): void

  • Inherited from ShareableBase.setLoggingName

    • Defined in core/ShareableBase.ts:155

    This method is for use within constructors.

    Immediately after a call to the super class constructor, make a call to setLoggingName. This will have the effect of refining the name used for reporting reference counts.

    This method has the secondary purpose of enabling a tally of the number of classes in the constructor chain. This enables the runtime architecture to verify that destructor chains are consistent with constructor chains, which is a good practice for cleaning up resources.

    Notice that this method is intentionally protected to discourage it from being called outside of the constructor.

    Parameters

    • name: string

    Returns void

subscribe

  • subscribe(engine: Engine): void

  • Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer.subscribe

    • Defined in core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:96

    Instructs the consumer to subscribe to context events.

    This method is idempotent; calling it more than once with the same Engine does not change the state.

    Parameters

    Returns void
